---

## üåå Quantum Physics & Astronomy (Core Interest)

**Purpose**: Understanding scale, perspective, wonder. Used for meditation and calm.

**Current Focus:**
- üéß **Sleepy Scientist** (YouTube) - Soothing quantum physics explanations
- üéß The Many Hidden Worlds of Quantum Mechanics (Audible) - Quantum physics deep dive

**Books in Library (9 total):**
- **The Many Hidden Worlds of Quantum Mechanics** - Sean Carroll, The Great Courses
- **Something Deeply Hidden** - Sean Carroll (quantum mechanics interpretation)
- **What Is Real?** - Adam Becker (history of quantum debate)
- **The Quantum Labyrinth** - Paul Halpern (Feynman & Wheeler)
- **Pale Blue Dot** - Carl Sagan (cosmos perspective)
- **Alien Earths** - Dr. Lisa Kaltenegger (exoplanets)
- **The Source** - Tara Swart MD PhD (neuroscience connection)

**Why This Matters:**
> "The idea that we are so infinitesimal and the sheer vastness of the universe fascinate me, and I often reflect on that and meditate."

**Origin:** 6th grade astronomy course at local college for kids - lifelong fascination

**Glass Pod Meditation:** Visualizing floating in tiny glass pod beside asteroid, looking at vast stars = incredibly soothing for stress/sleep

## üéØ High-Priority Books (To Read/Finish)

These are books I've added but haven't started or finished yet:

### Personal Development & Performance
- [[Built to Last]] - Jim Collins (Good to Great series)
- [[Ultralearning]] - Scott H. Young (mastering hard skills)
- [[The Art of Impossible]] - Steven Kotler (peak performance)
- [[Peak Mind]] - Amishi P. Jha (focus in 12 min/day)
- [[The Confident Mind]] - Dr. Nate Zinsser (battle-tested performance)
- [[Effortless]] - Greg McKeown (make what matters easier)

### Business & Strategy
- [[Good Strategy/Bad Strategy]] - Richard Rumelt
- [[The Cold Start Problem]] - Andrew Chen (network effects)
- [[The Right It]] - Alberto Savoia (why ideas fail)
- [[The Messy Middle]] - Scott Belsky (bold ventures)

### Health & Wellness
- [[Fast This Way]] - Dave Asprey (fasting, inflammation)
- [[The Genius Life]] - Max Lugavere (mind & body)
- [[Life in the Fasting Lane]] - Dr. Jason Fung
- [[The Body]] - Bill Bryson (guide for occupants)

### Mindset & Psychology
- [[Mindset]] - Carol Dweck (psychology of success)
- [[How to Do the Work]] - Dr. Nicole LePera (healing patterns)
- [[Stop Self-Sabotage]] - Judy Ho PhD
- [[Attached]] - Amir Levine (attachment science)

## üîó Integration with My System

### Morning Routine Books
Books that support my morning mindset and energy:
- Peak Mind (12-minute practice)
- The Source (science of the brain)
- Mindset (growth mindset)

### Workout/Walking Books
Books to listen to during exercise:
- Biographies & stories
- Science & exploration
- Lighter personal development

### Focus Time Books
Books for deep learning during focused work:
- Business strategy
- Technical topics
- Complex frameworks

### Evening Wind-Down Books
Books for reflection and rest:
- Fiction (The Giver of Stars, etc.)
- Philosophy & spirituality
- Gentle personal development

## üìù Book Notes Template

When I finish a book or capture key insights, create a note with:
- 3-5 key takeaways
- Immediate actions to implement
- Connection to my current goals/projects
- Favorite quotes or concepts
- Rating & recommendation
